TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationCommands extends System.Object
public ref class ApplicationCommands abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides a standard set of application related commands.

span.span: Provides a standard set of application related commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的命令類別和其他命令命令程式庫類別，例如和，用於代表一組應用程式設計人員經常遇到的常見命令。The commands in the class and commands in the other command library classes, such as and , are intended to represent a set of common commands that application programmers encounter frequently. 命令只代表的執行個體不實作邏輯的命令。The commands only represent the instance of the and not the implementation logic for the command. 實作邏輯繫結至命令與。The implementation logic is bound to the command with a . 例如，如果控制，這會執行的邏輯執行命令命令可能無法提供控制項，因此應用程式寫入器會負責寫決定控制項如何將邏輯處理命令。For example, if the command is executed on a control, the logic which performs the command may not be provided by the control, so the application writer will be responsible for writing the logic that determines how the control will handle the command. 許多控制項實作邏輯提供許多命令程式庫中的命令。Many controls do provide implementation logic for many of the commands in the command library. 例如，類別會提供邏輯， ， ， ，和命令。For example, the class provides logic for the , , , , and commands. 如需有關命令和命令，請參閱[指揮概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。For more information on commands and commanding see the [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand CancelPrint { get; }
.property class System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand CancelPrint
Public Shared ReadOnly Property CancelPrint As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ CancelPrint { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the value that represents the Cancel Print command.

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Cancel Print command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命令表示取消列印工作的方法。This command indicates intention to cancel a print job. 不一定會針對任何給定的物件; 此命令的實作在許多情況下的應用程式寫入器的責任是命令的實作。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

Public Shared ReadOnly Property Close As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ Close { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the value that represents the Close command.

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Close command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命令表示關閉項目 （通常檔案） 的方法。This command indicates intention to close an item (typically a file). 不一定會針對任何給定的物件; 此命令的實作在許多情況下的應用程式寫入器的責任是命令的實作。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

.property class System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand ContextMenu
Public Shared ReadOnly Property ContextMenu As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ ContextMenu { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the value that represents the Context Menu command.

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Context Menu command.

span.description: 滑鼠軌跡未附加至這個命令，但大部分的應用程式遵循的慣例來叫用操作功能表使用按右鍵手勢。
A Mouse Gesture is not attached to this command, but most applications follow the convention of using the Right Click gesture to invoke the context menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命令表示若要開啟操作功能表。This command indicates intention to open the context menu. 不一定會針對任何給定的物件; 此命令的實作在許多情況下的應用程式寫入器的責任是命令的實作。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命令表示選取範圍複製到剪貼簿。This command indicates intention to copy the selection to the clipboard. 不一定會針對任何給定的物件; 此命令的實作在許多情況下的應用程式寫入器的責任是命令的實作。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命令，開啟更正清單表示。This command indicates intention to open the correction list. 更正清單會根據內容而不同。The correction list is different depending on the context. 例如，與[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)]輸入更正清單識別重新轉換選項。For example, with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)] input the correction list identifies reconversion choices. 不一定會針對任何給定的物件; 此命令的實作在許多情況下的應用程式寫入器的責任是命令的實作。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令會被忽略，並不會處理輸入的事件導致。This command is always ignored and does not handle the input event that caused it. 這可用來關閉現有的控制項內建的輸入繫結。This provides a way to turn off an input binding built into an existing control. 不一定會針對任何給定的物件; 此命令的實作在許多情況下的應用程式寫入器的責任是命令的實作。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```
